LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: Reiri... wasn't there?

LABEL: 0x2E2
STRING: That was absurd.

LABEL: 0x2FE
STRING: Something like that wasn't possible.

LABEL: 0x32A
STRING: I went and checked on her myself this morning.

LABEL: 0x354
STRING: She was sleeping peacefully.

LABEL: 0x382
STRING: And she had been like that when I brought her food just a moment ago.

LABEL: 0x3CC
STRING: She didn't wake up, no matter how many times I called out to her,

LABEL: 0x455
STRING: but somehow, she was gone now?

LABEL: 0x491
STRING: Confused, I let my thoughts run wild.

LABEL: 0x4C3
STRING: Right―that key was a master key that contained falsified data.

LABEL: 0x50B
STRING: Aside from places with a high security level, such as the wheelhouse, most doors in the ship could be opened with it.

LABEL: 0x56B
STRING: I think Touri must've mistakenly opened the door to the wrong crew room.

LABEL: 0x614
STRING: 「Can I borrow the key?」

LABEL: 0x630
STRING: I snatched the keycard from Touri, who was getting increasingly upset.

LABEL: 0x6E2
STRING: And with that, I ran to the crew room.

LABEL: 0x777
STRING: 「You're kidding...」

LABEL: 0x793
STRING: Unfortunately...

LABEL: 0x7B1
STRING: It was indeed the room where Reiri was supposed to have slept.

LABEL: 0x7ED
STRING: The blanket on the bed was set aside.

LABEL: 0x817
STRING: The meal was untouched.

LABEL: 0x83F
STRING: That was what I had brought for her, no mistaking it.

LABEL: 0x873
STRING: I thought back to when I delivered the meal to her.

LABEL: 0x8A7
STRING: She had been sleeping in the same posture as this morning, but now there was no sign of her.

LABEL: 0x8EB
STRING: Why...?

LABEL: 0x905
STRING: Did someone take her away?

LABEL: 0x92B
STRING: Or did she wake up and leave on her own?

LABEL: 0x95F
STRING: No, the main problem was――

LABEL: 0x9F2
STRING: ――When?

LABEL: 0xA0C
STRING: When did Reiri leave this room?

LABEL: 0xA38
STRING: I thought back.

LABEL: 0xAC9
STRING: I was here an hour ago to deliver her food.

LABEL: 0xB00
STRING: So you're saying she disappeared between then and now...?

LABEL: 0xBA6
STRING: Just to be sure, I opened the door to the neighboring crew room and looked inside.

LABEL: 0xBF2
STRING: ―No one was there.

LABEL: 0xC10
STRING: There was no mistaking it.

LABEL: 0xCF9
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, when you came to deliver the meal――」

LABEL: 0xD38
STRING: 「Yeah, she was right here.」

LABEL: 0xD5E
STRING: 「She was still in bed like she had been this morning...」

LABEL: 0xDFC
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0xE1B
STRING: Hiragino seemed to believe my words even after all that'd happened.

LABEL: 0xE6D
STRING: Now that Yukari wasn't here, the decision-making was left to him.

LABEL: 0xF1F
STRING: 「Let's split up and look for her.」

LABEL: 0xF41
STRING: 「I'll go around from the top with Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0xF71
STRING: 「You two go from the first floor.」

LABEL: 0xFAA
STRING: 「Yeah!」

LABEL: 0xFC7
STRING: 「Got it.」

LABEL: 0xFF0
STRING: 「Okay, let's move!」

LABEL: 0x102D
STRING: After saying that, Hiragino and Touri ran for the stairs.

LABEL: 0x1065
STRING: Their backs looked somewhat familiar... It was like a re-enactment of the accident just yesterday.

LABEL: 0x10BD
STRING: It was still fresh in my mind, the time when we split up yesterday to search the ship for survivors.

LABEL: 0x1109
STRING: The difference was――

LABEL: 0x1123
STRING: Yesterday, we were looking for "anyone" without any hope of finding them, but this time we had a target in mind.

LABEL: 0x11FC
STRING: Reiri―a girl whose voice we hadn't even heard yet, nor knew the color of her eyes.

LABEL: 0x124E
STRING: If we could just find her, even that would be...

LABEL: 0x1282
STRING: That made me feel a little more at ease compared to yesterday.

LABEL: 0x1326
STRING: The interior of the ship, the front section itself, wasn't a large area to begin with.

LABEL: 0x136E
STRING: No matter how luxurious or large this submarine was, it was still just a submarine―a confined space separated from the open sea.

LABEL: 0x13D8
STRING: I was starting to feel better about our search with our objective being clear.

LABEL: 0x1430
STRING: It was better than looking for survivors who might or might not even exist.

LABEL: 0x1484
STRING: Not that there was anything comforting about a situation like that...

LABEL: 0x151F
STRING: Although...

LABEL: 0x1539
STRING: If someone had taken Reiri away...

LABEL: 0x157D
STRING: If there was a "someone" who had strangled Reiri last night――

LABEL: 0x15B7
STRING: Beads of sweat formed on my hand that was holding the keycard.

LABEL: 0x15E3
STRING: We couldn't give up.

LABEL: 0x16CB
STRING: I looked up with renewed determination.

LABEL: 0x16F7
STRING: Tokiwa was standing right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x171D
STRING: 「Right, let's go as well, Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x17C6
STRING: I called out to the girl before me and turned on my heel――

LABEL: 0x180A
STRING: ...And turned back to Tokiwa again.

LABEL: 0x18F2
STRING: 「Um... Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: She was unresponsive, as if my voice hadn't reached her.

LABEL: 0x1988
STRING: What was this?

LABEL: 0x19A2
STRING: It was like I was the only one in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x19EE
STRING: 「...Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x1A7C
STRING: 「Hmph.」

LABEL: 0x1A99
STRING: When I called out to her for the third time, Tokiwa turned away with a "hmph."

LABEL: 0x1AE1
STRING: She could totally hear me.

LABEL: 0x1B0F
STRING: She heard me and was ignoring me.

LABEL: 0x1B37
STRING: In fact, it was like she was rebelling against me.

LABEL: 0x1B89
STRING: I felt myself getting irritated at her unreasonable behavior.

LABEL: 0x1BC9
STRING: Why was I getting ignored at such a troublesome time and for some incomprehensible reason?

LABEL: 0x1C27
STRING: Yes, it was bad enough that I had lied about my name, but that was over now.

LABEL: 0x1C71
STRING: Finding Reiri was probably more important now.

LABEL: 0x1CA9
STRING: 「Please... You must be worried about Reiri, right?」

LABEL: 0x1D43
STRING: 「――Liar.」

LABEL: 0x1D66
STRING: Her tone was unexpectedly harsh, so I looked into Tokiwa's eyes.

LABEL: 0x1DA2
STRING: And then I realized.

LABEL: 0x1E1D
STRING: Her intense gaze and the feelings she was putting behind it... were not half-hearted.

LABEL: 0x1E78
STRING: 「Well, it's okay to say that you were the one who caused the accident.」

LABEL: 0x1ECE
STRING: 「You didn't do what you did because you wanted this situation to happen.」

LABEL: 0x1F2E
STRING: 「I don't care that you didn't tell anyone.」

LABEL: 0x1F6C
STRING: 「No one ever asked you about it.」

LABEL: 0x1FB0
STRING: 「In fact, you confided in us last night yourself.」

LABEL: 0x1FEA
STRING: 「If someone had asked you first, you would have answered.」

LABEL: 0x204D
STRING: She spoke in a more serious tone than ever before.

LABEL: 0x2093
STRING: I had never seen her so talkative.

LABEL: 0x20DF
STRING: But... what was this strange feeling?

LABEL: 0x2111
STRING: If she was saying that she didn't mind that I caused the accident or that I kept it hidden from everyone...

LABEL: 0x2167
STRING: Then what on earth was she so angry about?

LABEL: 0x21B4
STRING: 「――However.」

LABEL: 0x21D3
STRING: I ended up casting my eyes down as her tone turned more severe.

LABEL: 0x2271
STRING: 「However, you called yourself лл.」

LABEL: 0x22A5
STRING: 「A false name.」

LABEL: 0x22C8
STRING: Tokiwa's tone was sharp as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x22FA
STRING: Using a false name―that was the only thing she blamed me for.

LABEL: 0x2350
STRING: Maybe it was because of her anger, but her voice sounded like she was about to cry.

LABEL: 0x239E
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x242A
STRING: 「It's not good.」

LABEL: 0x2448
STRING: 「You can't do that.」

LABEL: 0x2462
STRING: 「I won't tolerate lying... I won't.」

LABEL: 0x2492
STRING: 「And you...」

LABEL: 0x24B0
STRING: 「Even though it was unintentional, you did harm many people.」

LABEL: 0x2557
STRING: 「That is the grave truth.」

LABEL: 0x2583
STRING: 「That crime, too, must be atoned for.」

LABEL: 0x25B4
STRING: Tokiwa was angry.

LABEL: 0x25D6
STRING: I had made her angry.

LABEL: 0x266F
STRING: ...Of course.

LABEL: 0x26E6
STRING: Saihouji Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x2702
STRING: In many ways, it was difficult to apply the word "normal" to her.

LABEL: 0x2746
STRING: But even so, it was impossible not to feel anger at what I had done, normally speaking.

LABEL: 0x279E
STRING: In which case, what I could do now was also normal, in other words.

LABEL: 0x285F
STRING: I bent my waist and lowered my head.

LABEL: 0x289B
STRING: 「...I apologize for the accident and for using a false name.」

LABEL: 0x28E1
STRING: 「I know that no amount of apologizing will make any difference.」

LABEL: 0x293F
STRING: 「At least for now, for those left behind,」

LABEL: 0x2975
STRING: 「I'll do everything I can to get you back to the surface safely.」

LABEL: 0x29C3
STRING: 「We can't afford to lose a single person, so――」

LABEL: 0x29F7
STRING: So, for now, we had to solve the problem at hand.

LABEL: 0x2A37
STRING: 「...Anyway, we have to search for Reiri at this moment.」

LABEL: 0x2A79
STRING: I said it out loud and looked Tokiwa in the eyes.

LABEL: 0x2B00
STRING: But, her eyes were half-closed, like she was sleepy.

LABEL: 0x2B55
STRING: 「I get what you're saying.」

LABEL: 0x2B89
STRING: 「But those are still just your words.」

LABEL: 0x2BCD
STRING: 「They don't resonate with me.」

LABEL: 0x2BFE
STRING: That... might be so.

LABEL: 0x2C28
STRING: In the end, my regrets were purely my own problem.

LABEL: 0x2C74
STRING: My own guilt, my own pangs of conscience.

LABEL: 0x2CAA
STRING: I just wanted to settle it all... That must have been it.

LABEL: 0x2CEC
STRING: 「...I get it. Let me be sincere.」

LABEL: 0x2D18
STRING: 「I'll do anything you ask of me.」

LABEL: 0x2D4A
STRING: 「So, please.」

LABEL: 0x2D76
STRING: 「Can you forgive me for lying about my name...?」

LABEL: 0x2DB6
STRING: 「Help me out here, please――」

LABEL: 0x2E4C
STRING: 「Anything?!」

LABEL: 0x2E95
STRING: Instantly, Tokiwa's eyes lit up.

LABEL: 0x2EBF
STRING: As if I had reached a ray of light at the bottom of an endless dark sea, I let out a sigh of relief...

LABEL: 0x2F25
STRING: But what lay in the depths wasn't necessarily hope.

LABEL: 0x2F63
STRING: 「Ah, yeah...」

LABEL: 0x2FED
STRING: 「I see,

LABEL: 0x3058
STRING: in that case...」

LABEL: 0x3128
STRING: 「Japanese men never go back on their word, right?」

LABEL: 0x3228
STRING: 「Right!」

LABEL: 0x324A
STRING: Tokiwa looked pleased, talking in a low voice as if she was the only one there.

LABEL: 0x32EA
STRING: It seemed she was already thinking about what she wanted me to do.

LABEL: 0x332C
STRING: Did I make... a mistake?

LABEL: 0x3352
STRING: Well, let's just consider ourselves lucky we found a solution.

LABEL: 0x338C
STRING: I called out to Tokiwa, whose eyes were wandering all around the empty space.

LABEL: 0x33D6
STRING: 「So, what do you want me to do?」

LABEL: 0x34DE
STRING: 「Sorry. My mind was flying all over the place.」

LABEL: 0x3517
STRING: 「...Don't overdo it.」

LABEL: 0x3535
STRING: Her mind was certainly flying, but the idiom had a slightly different meaning.

LABEL: 0x357F
STRING: 「So, what do I――」

LABEL: 0x3613
STRING: 「I want a Scalyfoot.」

LABEL: 0x3646
STRING: A... what?

LABEL: 0x3662
STRING: 「...Sorry, can you repeat that?」

LABEL: 0x3690
STRING: 「You want what?」

LABEL: 0x371E
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x3734
STRING: 「What I want is a Scalyfoot.」

LABEL: 0x3787
STRING: A Scalyfoot... Nope, never heard of it.

LABEL: 0x37C1
STRING: And I've probably never seen one, either.

LABEL: 0x37EB
STRING: All I knew was that it was probably written in katakana.

LABEL: 0x3837
STRING: Such a word didn't appear in my dictionary.

LABEL: 0x386B
STRING: 「What's a "Scalyfoot?"」

LABEL: 0x3911
STRING: 「『Crysomallon squamiferum.』」

LABEL: 0x3943
STRING: ...I didn't follow.

LABEL: 0x3963
STRING: That wasn't katakana at all.

LABEL: 0x3989
STRING: Was that... English?

LABEL: 0x39BB
STRING: 「In Japanese, please?」

LABEL: 0x39EC
STRING: 「A shellfish.」

LABEL: 0x3A09
STRING: A shellfish, huh?

LABEL: 0x3A1D
STRING: Then say so from the start.

LABEL: 0x3A5B
STRING: So, Tokiwa's terms were for me to go and get a Scalyfoot (shellfish).

LABEL: 0x3ABD
STRING: But... Shellfish...

LABEL: 0x3AE7
STRING: Shellfish?

LABEL: 0x3AFD
STRING: You know, those shellfish that are used in miso soup or grilled on a grill?

LABEL: 0x3B3B
STRING: Even if the deep sea was their territory, you couldn't just grab one and eat it.

LABEL: 0x3BF4
STRING: Hah.

LABEL: 0x3C08
STRING: I was worried about what kind of unreasonable demands Tokiwa would impose on me, but it seemed my fears were unfounded.

LABEL: 0x3C6C
STRING: I had won this match.

LABEL: 0x3CEF
STRING: I involuntarily paused and did a little victory pose.

LABEL: 0x3D23
STRING: Tokiwa tilted her head slightly seeing it.

LABEL: 0x3DC1
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x3DE1
STRING: 「Are you contacting the spirits?」

LABEL: 0x3E0C
STRING: 「Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x3E35
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x3E50
STRING: 「I'll get you your Scalyfoot for sure!」

LABEL: 0x3EC0
STRING: ...Why was she suddenly so composed?

LABEL: 0x3F02
STRING: The sense of security I felt was instantly clouded by Tokiwa's strange behavior, as usual.

LABEL: 0x3F60
STRING: There was a fairytale princess from a children's story who was said to have fought off princes who wooed her with unreasonable demands.

LABEL: 0x3FCA
STRING: But I wasn't trying to woo Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x4008
STRING: However, there didn't seem to be much difference between me and the princes.

LABEL: 0x4062
STRING: Hmm... Was this Scalyfoot even real?

LABEL: 0x40A0
STRING: Normally, I would try and look it up.

LABEL: 0x40D4
STRING: But now that all our electronic devices were left on land,

LABEL: 0x4112
STRING: the only thing I could rely on was Tokiwa's knowledge of the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x4158
STRING: ...How scary.

LABEL: 0x41E6
STRING: 「If you've decided, then let's go find Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4222
STRING: 「Come on.」

LABEL: 0x423D
STRING: 「Uh... Just out of curiosity...」

LABEL: 0x426F
STRING: 「What kind of shellfish is Scalyfoot?」

LABEL: 0x42B4
STRING: 「They live in the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x42D6
STRING: 「Their entire body is covered with hard scales.」

LABEL: 0x4365
STRING: 「The name Scalyfoot refers to their scaly legs, as expected.」

LABEL: 0x43B5
STRING: 「Their scales made of FeS are magnetic and will cling to your refrigerator!」

LABEL: 0x4406
STRING: 「They're just lovely.」

LABEL: 0x447D
STRING: 「Just as you'd expect from Macrobenthos.」

LABEL: 0x44A7
STRING: 「When you see its lovely shape, you'll say, "Ah, so this is a Scalyfoot."」

LABEL: 0x4522
STRING: I didn't really understand her explanation, but it sounded like it was real.

LABEL: 0x455C
STRING: And since it was real, I could do something about it... It was probably better than nothing.

LABEL: 0x45B2
STRING: 「Okay, leave it to me!」

LABEL: 0x45D2
STRING: 「I'll definitely get you your Scalyfoot!」

LABEL: 0x460A
STRING: And at that moment.

LABEL: 0x4626
STRING: She abruptly raised both of her hands in the air.

LABEL: 0x471B
STRING: 「Banzaai!」

LABEL: 0x4741
STRING: ...I felt like an idiot for getting startled by that.

LABEL: 0x4779
STRING: The sleeves of her kimono rolled up, exposing her dazzling white arms.

LABEL: 0x47C7
STRING: It should have been a sensational sight... but I was so startled just now that I didn't have time to appreciate it.

LABEL: 0x4831
STRING: Just as suddenly, she swung both of her arms down and looked me straight in the eye.

LABEL: 0x48E7
STRING: 「It's a promise.」

LABEL: 0x490A
STRING: 「――Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x4924
STRING: This promise must not be broken.

LABEL: 0x4956
STRING: Or rather, I must not lie.

LABEL: 0x4984
STRING: Whether I could regain the trust I had lost depended on it.

LABEL: 0x49CA
STRING: You might say it was a mere shellfish, but Tokiwa said she would forgive me in exchange for it.

LABEL: 0x4A26
STRING: She didn't break her promises.

LABEL: 0x4A64
STRING: 「Come on, let's go find Reiri first.」

LABEL: 0x4D1C
STRING: We went down to the first floor and headed for the playroom first.

LABEL: 0x4D56
STRING: The playroom, huh...?

LABEL: 0x4D74
STRING: Memories of last night's idle hours came flooding back.

LABEL: 0x4E40
STRING: I unlocked the door and opened it to find the chessboard we had played with last night left on the table.

LABEL: 0x4EA6
STRING: A good time was had by all.

LABEL: 0x4EC8
STRING: There was peace and routine then, even if it was false.

LABEL: 0x4EFC
STRING: And that all was broken――

LABEL: 0x4F8A
STRING: 「Since we're here, how about a match?」

LABEL: 0x4FBD
STRING: 「We don't have time for that, so maybe later.」

LABEL: 0x4FFD
STRING: I pushed Tokiwa out of the playroom.

LABEL: 0x5031
STRING: As far as I could tell from a glance, there were many things inside but no space to hide.

LABEL: 0x5085
STRING: We didn't do a thorough search, but...

LABEL: 0x50B1
STRING: ...It should be fine.

LABEL: 0x51E7
STRING: The next stop was the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x520B
STRING: It was the place I had visited with Yukari and Tokiwa this morning.

LABEL: 0x524F
STRING: However, if you were to ask me if things looked different from back then, the room was all too chaotic to tell to begin with.

LABEL: 0x52E1
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x52FD
STRING: Tokiwa's high-pitched voice rose from between a pile of cardboard boxes.

LABEL: 0x533D
STRING: I followed the sound to her.

LABEL: 0x53CA
STRING: 「Did something happen?」

LABEL: 0x544C
STRING: 「It's deep-fried oarfish!」

LABEL: 0x5483
STRING: 「I really need to try this one!」

LABEL: 0x54AF
STRING: 「What about you, лл-san?」

LABEL: 0x54DE
STRING: 「Why are you asking me?!」

LABEL: 0x5502
STRING: 「And my name is Katagiri!」

LABEL: 0x559E
STRING: 「Was it?」

LABEL: 0x55C5
STRING: Why was I shouting again...?

LABEL: 0x55F7
STRING: If I left her alone, she would likely find something unnecessary again, so it was best to get out of here quickly.

LABEL: 0x57A8
STRING: 「It was uninhabited.」

LABEL: 0x57D3
STRING: 「Same here.」

LABEL: 0x57EF
STRING: Tokiwa reported to me as she exited the women's restroom.

LABEL: 0x582D
STRING: I guess this meant that the search of the first floor was over...

LABEL: 0x5887
STRING: No, there was one more place.

LABEL: 0x58A7
STRING: ――The only one remaining.

LABEL: 0x5933
STRING: 「Next stop is the research room.」

LABEL: 0x595A
STRING: I followed Tokiwa, who was walking ahead of me with her feet clacking on the floor.

LABEL: 0x59B0
STRING: ...Hiragino was unable to unlock the research room last night and did not check inside.

LABEL: 0x5A08
STRING: If there was another person besides us here, that room was the most likely place.

LABEL: 0x5A76
STRING: At the door, I took out the keycard from my pocket.

LABEL: 0x5AB0
STRING: This key should be able to open this door.

LABEL: 0x5ADA
STRING: When I held it over the reader, the light flashed, and the lock was released.

LABEL: 0x5B1A
STRING: Oh, had I mentioned this keycard to Tokiwa yet?

LABEL: 0x5B5E
STRING: 「Tokiwa, this key...」

LABEL: 0x5BFA
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0x5C23
STRING: ...She didn't show an unusual reaction.

LABEL: 0x5C57
STRING: I think she was already clued in on my keycard.

LABEL: 0x5CAF
STRING: I stopped Tokiwa from spontaneously reaching for the door.

LABEL: 0x5CED
STRING: 「I'll go in first.」

LABEL: 0x5D09
STRING: 「Step back, just in case.」

LABEL: 0x5D31
STRING: Just in case.

LABEL: 0x5D4B
STRING: I slid the door open slightly and peeked inside through the gap.

LABEL: 0x5E3F
STRING: It was dark. There was no sign of anyone.

LABEL: 0x5E71
STRING: It was called the research room, but at a quick glance, it looked no different from a typical office.

LABEL: 0x5EBB
STRING: There were several desks and chairs set in a row.

LABEL: 0x5EE3
STRING: Many of the chairs had fallen, probably due to the shaking caused by the collision.

LABEL: 0x5F93
STRING: 「Let's enter the laboratory.」

LABEL: 0x5FBE
STRING: Right.

LABEL: 0x5FD2
STRING: As Yukari had said, there was a laboratory inside the research room.

LABEL: 0x601C
STRING: In terms of size and role, the main focus must've been on that.

LABEL: 0x607E
STRING: Just inside the entrance, to the left, was the door that Tokiwa was pointing to――

LABEL: 0x611D
STRING: The first thing that caught my eye was the biohazard symbol.

LABEL: 0x615F
STRING: I simply stood there, having not expected to see what I saw.

LABEL: 0x618F
STRING: However, there was nothing unusual about a biohazard symbol and such if you had been to a university.

LABEL: 0x61EF
STRING: If you walked into any biological laboratory building, you would see them everywhere.

LABEL: 0x6239
STRING: But this...

LABEL: 0x6266
STRING: 「Biosafety Level 4.」

LABEL: 0x62B1
STRING: I wasn't that familiar with the subject, but I believe the flu virus was only BSL2.

LABEL: 0x6315
STRING: The highest level of danger.

LABEL: 0x6337
STRING: Would Ebola, for example, have fallen under this category?

LABEL: 0x636F
STRING: I'd like to search inside as soon as possible, but we had to be cautious here.

LABEL: 0x63AF
STRING: Click.

LABEL: 0x63EC
STRING: 「Haiyah!」

LABEL: 0x64C3
STRING: I looked toward the sound and saw Tokiwa unlocking and pulling the door open.

LABEL: 0x650B
STRING: 「Wha―you idiot!」

LABEL: 0x6529
STRING: As I stood there, the door in front of me slid open.

LABEL: 0x65DE
STRING: I covered my face with one hand while extending the other toward the door that I couldn't reach.

LABEL: 0x6632
STRING: 「Hey, wait――」

LABEL: 0x665C
STRING: ――And, the door opened unceremoniously.

LABEL: 0x6698
STRING: I peeked fearfully through the gap between my fingers.

LABEL: 0x671D
STRING: Floating in the darkness was another door.

LABEL: 0x6751
STRING: ...Haah.

LABEL: 0x6769
STRING: I sighed with relief.

LABEL: 0x68B6
STRING: 「What are you doing?!」

LABEL: 0x6948
STRING: 「Searching.」

LABEL: 0x6967
STRING: 「That's not what I meant!」

LABEL: 0x699F
STRING: I pointed to the biohazard symbol on the door.

LABEL: 0x69D5
STRING: 「It says BSL4!」

LABEL: 0x69FF
STRING: 「Don't just open it as you please!」

LABEL: 0x6A97
STRING: 「It's fine.」

LABEL: 0x6AB8
STRING: 「What is?!」

LABEL: 0x6AE1
STRING: 「No experiments should've been conducted yet.」

LABEL: 0x6B20
STRING: 「You don't know that!」

LABEL: 0x6BBC
STRING: 「I do know.」

LABEL: 0x6BDD
STRING: Tokiwa traced the biohazard symbol with her finger and spoke clearly.

LABEL: 0x6C36
STRING: 「Momoi-san told us earlier that the research group was not on board this time.」

LABEL: 0x6C8A
STRING: 「And this is the maiden voyage of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x6CC1
STRING: 「Besides, there's no sign that the desks inside the research room have been used. If that's the case, then the laboratory must not have been used either.」

LABEL: 0x6DB5
STRING: ...That certainly made sense.

LABEL: 0x6DF9
STRING: But then again...

LABEL: 0x6E1F
STRING: 「If you were going to open the door, at least say something beforehand――」

LABEL: 0x6E65
STRING: Click.

LABEL: 0x6E7D
STRING: The second door slid open.

LABEL: 0x6EAB
STRING: 「Oh, for God's sake!」

LABEL: 0x6ECD
STRING: 「Listen to meeee!」

LABEL: 0x6F56
STRING: I immediately held my breath and braced myself in a fighting stance.

LABEL: 0x6FB4
STRING: ...I know, I know.

LABEL: 0x6FD6
STRING: My pose wasn't the least bit useful if you were dealing with a virus you couldn't see.

LABEL: 0x702D
STRING: 「Hmmm, maybe the lights are around here?」

LABEL: 0x7063
STRING: 「――There!」

LABEL: 0x7084
STRING: The world lit up along with her voice.

LABEL: 0x7145
STRING: 「Hooh...」

LABEL: 0x715F
STRING: The space was more than twice as large as the research room.

LABEL: 0x719B
STRING: The pure white laboratory was magnificent, reminiscent of a one-of-a-kind research institute.

LABEL: 0x71E7
STRING: As Tokiwa had said, there was no evidence of it being used.

LABEL: 0x7225
STRING: Although there were a few things that looked like lab equipment scattered on the floor...

LABEL: 0x726B
STRING: It looked like they could be used for experiments without any issues.

LABEL: 0x72A9
STRING: All the test tubes and other items on the shelves were safe.

LABEL: 0x72D9
STRING: As one would expect from a submarine, this place was probably equipped with a shock-absorbing system to prevent shaking.

LABEL: 0x7339
STRING: Actually, it was strange to place a BSL4 laboratory on a submarine where shaking and vibrations were inevitable.

LABEL: 0x7393
STRING: Even though it was state-of-the-art... I was surprised it had been allowed.

LABEL: 0x7431
STRING: 「Whoaaa...」

LABEL: 0x7454
STRING: Tokiwa walked up to the shelves while making weird noises.

LABEL: 0x7492
STRING: What was it now?

LABEL: 0x74AE
STRING: Did some bacteria infect her brain?

LABEL: 0x7597
STRING: 「Oooh...

LABEL: 0x765B
STRING: Ooohh...」

LABEL: 0x767D
STRING: Nope.

LABEL: 0x7693
STRING: She must just be excited to be surrounded by all this lab equipment.

LABEL: 0x76E3
STRING: As I watched, she began digging out one strange item after another from the back of the shelves.

LABEL: 0x772D
STRING: There was some kind of a round tank,

LABEL: 0x7755
STRING: a microscope-looking thing,

LABEL: 0x7779
STRING: and... ah.

LABEL: 0x778D
STRING: There were many other things she produced that I had no clue what they were.

LABEL: 0x77CB
STRING: I'd seen some of these incomprehensible devices in laboratories on the surface.

LABEL: 0x7811
STRING: But then there were also a collection of things I'd never even laid eyes on.

LABEL: 0x785B
STRING: This had to be very exciting for Tokiwa, in any case.

LABEL: 0x789F
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x78B7
STRING: Our target, namely Reiri, did not seem to be here.

LABEL: 0x78E3
STRING: There was no place to hide here in the first place.

LABEL: 0x790B
STRING: I looked under the tables and walked around the room, just in case.

LABEL: 0x794D
STRING: 「Shall we leave?」

LABEL: 0x79D3
STRING: 「Sorry. Just a little more.」

LABEL: 0x7A5A
STRING: 「Seven hours should be enough.」

LABEL: 0x7A86
STRING: 「No way.」

LABEL: 0x7A9E
STRING: Why did she look like she was making a compromise here?

LABEL: 0x7ACE
STRING: What was her sense of time like?

LABEL: 0x7B0F
STRING: 「Don't worry so much.」

LABEL: 0x7B3B
STRING: 「You'll get old, you know?」

LABEL: 0x7B5E
STRING: 「That's none of your business. Let's just go――」

LABEL: 0x7BFC
STRING: 「I don't wanna.」

LABEL: 0x7C19
STRING: Did she understand how selfish she was acting...?!

LABEL: 0x7C55
STRING: 「...Don't you care about the Scalyfoot?」

LABEL: 0x7CF3
STRING: 「Is that a threat?」

LABEL: 0x7D16
STRING: 「No, I just thought you forgot our promise.」

LABEL: 0x7D57
STRING: 「But we searched already.」

LABEL: 0x7D84
STRING: 「We're not done yet, right?」

LABEL: 0x7E1E
STRING: 「...But, we did search.」

LABEL: 0x7E47
STRING: 「Then what about Hiragino-san and Touri?」

LABEL: 0x7E77
STRING: 「They must think we're looking for Reiri right now, so are we going to let them down?」

LABEL: 0x7F61
STRING: 「...Wouldn't be good.」

LABEL: 0x7F8A
STRING: Tokiwa stopped and stared at me in frustration.

LABEL: 0x7FC4
STRING: Was she a five-year-old or something...?

LABEL: 0x7FDF
STRING: 「Shall we?」

LABEL: 0x8015
STRING: I left the laboratory while pulling Tokiwa's hand after she nodded reluctantly.

LABEL: 0x80E4
STRING: 「Well... We're finally done with the first floor.」

LABEL: 0x8184
STRING: 「No, not yet.」

LABEL: 0x81A9
STRING: Tokiwa stopped in the hallway and stared at the wall.

LABEL: 0x81ED
STRING: I follow her gaze and...

LABEL: 0x8249
STRING: 「Is that... a door?」

LABEL: 0x8269
STRING: There was a small door between the playroom and the research room.

LABEL: 0x8299
STRING: It was designed to blend in with the walls and would almost be overlooked if you didn't know about it.

LABEL: 0x82F1
STRING: However, if you looked closely, you could see the shape of a door.

LABEL: 0x832D
STRING: ...Why was there a door here?

LABEL: 0x835B
STRING: Were there even any more rooms on this floor?

LABEL: 0x838F
STRING: I thought back to the map.

LABEL: 0x83C6
STRING: 「This area should be connected to the basement heating system.」

LABEL: 0x8407
STRING: I see. Then it wasn't surprising that it was not written on the map meant for the general public.

LABEL: 0x8459
STRING: I held my keycard over the reader to open it――

LABEL: 0x84F6
STRING: Umm...

LABEL: 0x850E
STRING: There wasn't one...

LABEL: 0x8526
STRING: There was nothing that looked like a keycard reader.

LABEL: 0x8560
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x857E
STRING: They were hiding the door, so there was no way they'd put something so visible next to it.

LABEL: 0x8629
STRING: But... How did you open this thing?

LABEL: 0x865D
STRING: Even if you had a key that could open any door, you could do nothing without a keyhole.

LABEL: 0x86AB
STRING: 「I don't know how to open it...」

LABEL: 0x8743
STRING: 「Leave this to me.」

LABEL: 0x8766
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x8796
STRING: Tokiwa bent her arms as if to flex and rolled up the sleeves of her glamorous kimono.

LABEL: 0x87E4
STRING: ...Come on, no way.

LABEL: 0x8923
STRING: 「Nnnnnnnn――」

LABEL: 0x8A32
STRING: 「Hyaah!」

LABEL: 0x8A7D
STRING: She spun her arms around like a windmill and rushed straight for the door.

LABEL: 0x8ABF
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x8AE6
STRING: 「Ah.」

LABEL: 0x8B66
STRING: Stepping on the hem of her kimono, Tokiwa stumbled and crashed face-first into the door.

LABEL: 0x8BBE
STRING: ...Whoa.

LABEL: 0x8BD8
STRING: She missed.

LABEL: 0x8BF2
STRING: 「Hey, you all right?」

LABEL: 0x8CC1
STRING: I pulled Tokiwa up from the floor.

LABEL: 0x8D00
STRING: Sheesh, your nose and forehead are bright red.

LABEL: 0x8D34
STRING: Tears were pooling in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x8D5E
STRING: She rubbed the tip of her nose.

LABEL: 0x8DB1
STRING: 「Dis doesn'd loog lige id'll oben.」

LABEL: 0x8DEE
STRING: Take it easy, will you...

LABEL: 0x90DA
STRING: With that, we finished our search of the first floor.

LABEL: 0x910E
STRING: When we went up to the second floor, we ran into Hiragino and Touri coming out of the shower room.

LABEL: 0x91D0
STRING: 「Oh, uhh, don't get the wrong idea now.」

LABEL: 0x9203
STRING: I wasn't about to.

LABEL: 0x921F
STRING: I mean, what were you insinuating in front of the girls?

LABEL: 0x9279
STRING: 「We went around the first floor but found no one...」

LABEL: 0x92AD
STRING: 「What about you?」

LABEL: 0x92C9
STRING: Even without hearing it from their mouths――

LABEL: 0x9350
STRING: The answer was obvious just from looking at Touri's face.

LABEL: 0x9386
STRING: Hiragino shook his head.

LABEL: 0x9414
STRING: 「We looked everywhere we could think of, but couldn't find even a trace of her.」

LABEL: 0x946F
STRING: In other words...

LABEL: 0x9485
STRING: In such a closed space, Reiri had disappeared without a trace?

LABEL: 0x94D5
STRING: How was that even possible...?

LABEL: 0x9542
STRING: 「Aah... I don't get it.」

LABEL: 0x956B
STRING: Hiragino scratched his head.

LABEL: 0x958F
STRING: 「Is there any place we haven't looked at yet?」

LABEL: 0x962F
STRING: 「If there is...」

LABEL: 0x9651
STRING: 「It would be the room Yukari is sleeping in.」

LABEL: 0x9680
STRING: Yukari... I wasn't brave enough to wake her up.

LABEL: 0x96B0
STRING: Besides, if Reiri had visited her, Yukari would have reacted in some way.

LABEL: 0x9734
STRING: Us two men wracked our heads in thought.

LABEL: 0x9762
STRING: Strange... Think...

LABEL: 0x9786
STRING: What was impossible was impossible...

LABEL: 0x97B2
STRING: What...

LABEL: 0x97C8
STRING: We must be missing something...

LABEL: 0x97F8
STRING: ――And that was when someone raised their voice.

LABEL: 0x9824
STRING: Of course, it was her.

LABEL: 0x98B2
STRING: 「There's still the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x98FD
STRING: The rear section.

LABEL: 0x991F
STRING: The first floor of the rear section was now available after yesterday's rescue operation.

LABEL: 0x9967
STRING: I had forgotten all about it... or perhaps I had tried to erase it from my memory.

LABEL: 0x9A2D
STRING: 「And, we should be able to open the bridges now too.」

LABEL: 0x9A82
STRING: That was right.

LABEL: 0x9AB2
STRING: Hiragino looked surprised and straightened up.

LABEL: 0x9B50
STRING: 「We haven't looked at the bridges yet either.」

LABEL: 0x9B84
STRING: 「We didn't open them yesterday, so we totally forgot...」

LABEL: 0x9BCD
STRING: 「Surely they can be opened now.」

LABEL: 0x9C15
STRING: The bridge would close when sensors inside and outside the doors detected flooding.

LABEL: 0x9C55
STRING: Conversely, if there was a pool of water inside the bridge, it could still open if the water was drained.

LABEL: 0x9CBF
STRING: Considering that the air conditioning was working, it was quite possible that the drainage was already done.

LABEL: 0x9D1F
STRING: 「In any case, let's go check the bridge.」

LABEL: 0x9E61
STRING: The bridge on the second floor was... open.

LABEL: 0x9E89
STRING: So the water had drained as we thought.

LABEL: 0x9EB9
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x9EE0
STRING: 「There's no one here...」

LABEL: 0x9F03
STRING: The door at the back―a steel plate that was supposed to lead to the rear section―didn't budge at all.

LABEL: 0x9F51
STRING: We then headed to the third floor.

LABEL: 0x9FFA
STRING: 「...Last night, as well as today...」

LABEL: 0xA026
STRING: 「Why are all these incidents happening to her...?」

LABEL: 0xA061
STRING: ...His question wasn't directed at me.

LABEL: 0xA0A5
STRING: When I glanced at him, Hiragino looked to be thinking to himself.

LABEL: 0xA185
STRING: Eventually, we made it to the front of the third-floor bridge.

LABEL: 0xA1B7
STRING: A heavy watertight door towered over us.

LABEL: 0xA1E1
STRING: Hiragino grumbled to himself, having arrived here.

LABEL: 0xA281
STRING: 「You should've been with Reiri-kun since last night...」

LABEL: 0xA2BF
STRING: 「Has she been asleep the whole time?」

LABEL: 0xA2F6
STRING: 「Yes, for sure.」

LABEL: 0xA314
STRING: 「When I brought her the meal today, she was still in the same position she had been since morning――」

LABEL: 0xA3F5
STRING: ――Wait a minute.

LABEL: 0xA415
STRING: "The same position?"

LABEL: 0xA523
STRING: 「...Is it possible that when you go into a state of deep sleep, you don't toss and turn?」

LABEL: 0xA58A
STRING: 「Have you heard of REM and non-REM sleep?」

LABEL: 0xA5D0
STRING: 「REM stands for "Rapid Eye Movement."」

LABEL: 0xA617
STRING: 「During REM sleep, a person's eyes are moving intensely. At the same time, the brain maintains a high level of consciousness.」

LABEL: 0xA67B
STRING: 「Instead, the body's muscles relax and become totally immobile. That's called REM weakness, and at that stage the body can't move at all.」

LABEL: 0xA701
STRING: 「Non-REM sleep, on the other hand, is the exact opposite of REM sleep, in which the brain is asleep, but the body is awake.」

LABEL: 0xA773
STRING: 「At this stage, there's no conscious activity. Instead, the body is actively moving. That's the so-called "turning and tossing."」

LABEL: 0xA7E7
STRING: 「People always move during non-REM sleep―if they're in the proper state.」

LABEL: 0xA83B
STRING: 「So, if they don't move...」

LABEL: 0xA86F
STRING: 「Delayed Consciousness Disorder, or in other words, they'd have to be dead or in a vegetative state.」

LABEL: 0xA934
STRING: 「――To put it simply,

LABEL: 0xA94D
STRING: you're either awake or you're not.」

LABEL: 0xA972
STRING: Why hadn't I noticed that?

LABEL: 0xAA01
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0xAA2A
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0xAA49
STRING: 「Maybe Reiri――」

LABEL: 0xAA73
STRING: Just as I was about to say that...

LABEL: 0xAAA2
STRING: 「Open Sesame!」

LABEL: 0xAB26
STRING: On Tokiwa's signal, the button was pressed, and the thick watertight door slid open.

LABEL: 0xAB72
STRING: Our eyes were drawn toward the passageway.

LABEL: 0xABAC
STRING: And inside――

LABEL: 0xAC23
STRING: Red.

LABEL: 0xAC37
STRING: Red blood, spreading all around us.
